text: Viitasaari is a small city in Central Finland. The municipalities next to it are Kannonkoski, Keitele, Kinnula, Kivijärvi, Pihtipudas, Vesanto and Äänekoski. Most people speak Finnish ==Nature== Viitasaari is known about lakes and rapids. == Other websites == * The official site Category:Cities in Finland Category:Municipalities of Central Finland
title: Viitasaari
